name: Atharva Kulkarni
title: President
description: Atharva is an aspiring data scientist looking to use his experience for the broader social good. He has worked on finding keystone gut microbiota that can mitigate refractory epilepsy and a semi-supervised model that can detect illegal activity in graph social networks. But he knows not everything good in life has to start with pd.read_csv() -  he enjoys cooking, exploring the outdoors, and reading books related to history, philosophy, and the sciences.

name: Prabina Pokharel
title: VP Finance
description: Prabina is an aspiring data scientist exploring the many possibilities to use data to make a difference in the world. At SANDAG, she led efforts to create a dashboard which tracks San Diego's compliance with UN SDG's. Currently, she's working with an AI lab at UCSD to detect intoxicated drivers. In her spare time, she enjoys running, hiking, and spending time with her family and friends.

name: Jack Kai Lim
title: VP External
description: Hello everyone, my name is Jack Kai Lim. I am the Vice President External from Malaysia, with a focus in Machine Learning and AI. I look forward to having a great year with all of you!

name: Shivangi Gupta
title: Online Content Director
description: Shivangi is an economics and data science student who is hopeful about working as a data scientist upon graduation. She's interned at SDG&E, where she built a ML model to optimize customers' journeys when interacting with the online self-service portal, MyAccount. In her free time, she loves to read romance and thriller novels, watch reality TV shows, and play chess!

name: Luran Zhang
title: Professional Events Co-Director
description: Hello, this is Luran (Lauren)ðŸ˜„. I am a third year student from Muir college double major in Data Science and Joint Math Econ. During my free time, I enjoy solving puzzles, watching movies, snowboarding, and rock climbing (just picked it up this summer).

name: Trey Scheid
title: Professional Events Co-Director
description: Trey is a Data Science major with an interest in recommender systems and machine learning methods. He has gained valuable experience in roles ranging from a student startup to the manufacturing industry where he created classification models and evaluated production using Operational Equipment Effectiveness. In addition to his academic pursuits, he enjoys photography and fringe "sports".

name: Advaith Ravishankar
title: Projects Co-Director
description: I am a third-year undergraduate at UC San Diego who specializes in Computer Vision and Data Science. I have over 2 years of research experience applying computer vision models in computational neuroscience, making it easier to annotate 2D poses in video data. I am currently interested in generative AI by combining both NLP and computer vision to automatically generate videos based on text prompts.

name: Victor Thai
title: Projects Co-Director
description: Victor is a fourth year data science major and also pursuing a minor in cognitive science. He has interests in data science, but also software engineering as well where he currently works as a student developer for UCSD ITS.

name: Goldie Jin
title: Design Co-Director
description: I'm Goldie Jin, a fourth-year Computer Engineering student at UC San Diego. My blend of technical skills and graphic design expertise from UCSD drives my passion for technology and innovation. I'm eager to contribute to Computer Engineering and Data Visualization fields and excited to connect with new DS3 members.

name: Kai Chester Ni
title: Design Co-Director
description: Kai is a fourth year data science major at Muir College at UCSD. Kai believes in a better future of tech, where every individual's digital rights and privacy are protected. In working with data, he hopes to bring emphasis to the real people and real stories behind each datapoint, and leverage the skills and experience he develops to build a safe and constructive cyberverse for all.

name: Anthony Dang
title: Social Director
description: Hi! I'm Anthony, a fourth year, who will be your Social Director this year. Let's fight the stigma that UCSD data science majors are socially dead and have a fun filled year!

name: Christine Deng
title: Marketing Director
description: Christine is a data science student interested in data-driven content creation. She loves creating compelling content and connecting to audiences through an analytical and creative approach. She also works as a student graphic designer for the HalÄ±cÄ±oÄŸlu Data Science Institute. Outside of academics, you can find her on-air DJing for UCSD's radio station!

name: Jonathan Lo
title: Infrastructure Director
description: Jonathan is a data science student at UC San Diego. He is a software engineer intern at San Diego Supercomputer Center, where he works on data-enabled scientific computing. He has also been a webmaster of the Data Science Student Society at UCSD and a data quality intern at Fluidra North America.

name: Jason Gu
title: VP Internal
description: Hi! My name is Jason and I am currently a fourth year data science major. As VP Internal I am here to help members around me and make everyone feel welcomed within this org. In my free time I enjoy playing the guitar, singing, going to the gym, going on late night drives, and any outdoor activities. Feel free to reach out to me whaenever!
